column2: Alpha Black to HQ. All vehicles east of Maarn are smoking hulks. Objective One complete. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. Target Two is done. Enemy AFVs and trucks at Camerig are destroyed. Over.
Papa Bear, Alpha Black here. The Reds at objective three, east of the old Nazi resort, are taking a permanent vacation from life. Over.
Alpha to Papa Bear. We just destroyed the vehicle laager at the fourth objective. Over.
Papa Bear, Papa Bear, this is Alpha. Be advised, we've returned to base and are standing down. Over.
Affirmative, Alpha Black, we see a lot of smoke columns in your direction. Nice. HQ out.
Alpha Black, we read you. Understood. Fine work. Papa Bear out.
Papa Bear to Alpha One. Copy that, Alpha. Stay on them. Out.
This is Papa Bear, we hear you Alpha. Acknowledged, that was an important bunch. There was a regimental command vehicle among them. Good job. Out.
We see you, Alpha. Congratulations on your safe return, and thanks. Mission accomplished. Papa Bear out.
